    public class FViewRootImpl
extends android.view.View
implements IFViewRoot
    Created by XiongFangyu on 2017/11/7. special view whitch contain all FView

      • post

        public boolean post(java.lang.Runnable action)
        从接口复制的说明: FViewParent

        Causes the Runnable to be added to the message queue. The runnable will be run on the user interface thread.

        指定者:
        post 在接口中 FViewParent
        覆盖:
        post 在类中 android.view.View
        参数:
        action - The Runnable that will be executed.
        返回:
        Returns true if the Runnable was successfully placed in to the message queue. Returns false on failure, usually because the looper processing the message queue is exiting.
        另请参阅:
        FViewParent.postDelayed(java.lang.Runnable, long), FViewParent.removeCallbacks(java.lang.Runnable)

      • postDelayed

        public boolean postDelayed(java.lang.Runnable action,
                           long delayMillis)
        从接口复制的说明: FViewParent

        Causes the Runnable to be added to the message queue, to be run after the specified amount of time elapses. The runnable will be run on the user interface thread.

        指定者:
        postDelayed 在接口中 FViewParent
        覆盖:
        postDelayed 在类中 android.view.View
        参数:
        action - The Runnable that will be executed.
        delayMillis - The delay (in milliseconds) until the Runnable will be executed.
        返回:
        true if the Runnable was successfully placed in to the message queue. Returns false on failure, usually because the looper processing the message queue is exiting. Note that a result of true does not mean the Runnable will be processed -- if the looper is quit before the delivery time of the message occurs then the message will be dropped.
        另请参阅:
        FViewParent.post(java.lang.Runnable), FViewParent.removeCallbacks(java.lang.Runnable)

      • removeCallbacks

        public boolean removeCallbacks(java.lang.Runnable action)
        从接口复制的说明: FViewParent

        Removes the specified Runnable from the message queue.

        指定者:
        removeCallbacks 在接口中 FViewParent
        覆盖:
        removeCallbacks 在类中 android.view.View
        参数:
        action - The Runnable to remove from the message handling queue
        返回:
        true if this view could ask the Handler to remove the Runnable, false otherwise. When the returned value is true, the Runnable may or may not have been actually removed from the message queue (for instance, if the Runnable was not in the queue already.)
        另请参阅:
        FViewParent.post(java.lang.Runnable), FViewParent.postDelayed(java.lang.Runnable, long)

      • findFViewById

        public FView findFViewById(int id)
        从接口复制的说明: IFViewRoot
        Finds the first descendant view with the given ID, the view itself if the ID matches IView.getId(), or null if the ID is invalid (< 0) or there is no matching view in the hierarchy.

        Note: In most cases -- depending on compiler support -- the resulting view is automatically cast to the target class type. If the target class type is unconstrained, an explicit cast may be necessary.

        指定者:
        findFViewById 在接口中 IFViewRoot
        参数:
        id - the ID to search for
        返回:
        a view with given ID if found, or null otherwise

      • onMeasure

      • measureChildWithMargins

        public void measureChildWithMargins(FView child,
                                    int parentWidthMeasureSpec,
                                    int widthUsed,
                                    int parentHeightMeasureSpec,
                                    int heightUsed)
        从接口复制的说明: FViewParent
        Ask one of the children of this view to measure itself, taking into account both the MeasureSpec requirements for this view and its padding and margins. The child must have MarginLayoutParams The heavy lifting is done in getChildMeasureSpec.
        指定者:
        measureChildWithMargins 在接口中 FViewParent
        参数:
        child - The child to measure
        parentWidthMeasureSpec - The width requirements for this view
        widthUsed - Extra space that has been used up by the parent horizontally (possibly by other children of the parent)
        parentHeightMeasureSpec - The height requirements for this view
        heightUsed - Extra space that has been used up by the parent vertically (possibly by other children of the parent)

      • onDraw

        protected void onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        覆盖:
        onDraw 在类中 android.view.View
